name: set user to flow
check pwd
gen token
insert login history
func:
let userInfo = msg['userInfo']
let dbUser = msg['dbUser']
let newPayload = []
userInfo['token'] = msg.payload

let sqlStr = 'insert into api_login_history(userId, userToken, history_login_time, history_ip, history_type, createTime) values ('+dbUser.userId+',"'+msg.payload+'", current_time(), "'+userInfo.ip+'", '+userInfo.type+', current_time())'
msg['flow'] = getRandomNumber(10)
msg['topic'] = sqlStr
msg['userInfo'] = userInfo
newPayload.push(msg.payload)
newPayload.push(60)
newPayload.push('')
msg.payload = newPayload
return msg
function getRandomNumber(quantity_of_nums){
   var milliseconds = new Date().getMilliseconds()
   return Math.floor(milliseconds * quantity_of_nums / 1000)
}

name: set result
func:
let newPayload = {}
let userData = {}
let userInfo = msg['userInfo']
let dbUser = msg['dbUser']
let grps = msg['grps']
if(msg.payload.affectedRows && msg.payload.affectedRows > 0){
    userData['name'] = dbUser['userName']
    userData['nickName'] = dbUser['nickName']
    userData['gender'] = dbUser['gender']
    userData['pic'] = dbUser['pic']
    userData['email'] = dbUser['email']
    newPayload['userInfo'] = userData
    newPayload['services'] = grps
    newPayload['role'] = dbUser['roleName']
    newPayload['authToken'] = userInfo['token']
    newPayload['responseCode'] = '000'
    newPayload['responseMsg'] = 'login success'
}else{
    newPayload['responseCode'] = '999'
    newPayload['responseMsg'] = 'insert history fail'
}
msg['payload'] = newPayload
return msg

name: set pwd
func:
let dbUser = msg['dbUser']
msg['grps'] = msg.payload
msg.payload = dbUser.userPwd
return msg

name: set property sql
set expire
func:
let newPayload = []
let userInfo = msg['userInfo']
let expireTime = 86400
if(msg.payload.length > 0){
  expireTime = msg.payload[0]['p_value']
}
newPayload.push(userInfo.token)
newPayload.push(expireTime)
newPayload.push(userInfo.decryptToken)
msg.payload = newPayload
return msg

name: set all prop query
set result
check grp
set token to payload
set token len
func:
let actInfo = msg['actInfo']
let token = msg.payload
let check = 0
let ar = token.split(':')
if(ar.length == 6){
  check = 1
  actInfo['grp'] = ar[0]
  actInfo['ts'] = ar[1]
  actInfo['userId'] = ar[2]
  actInfo['cpId'] = ar[3]
  actInfo['roleId'] = ar[4]
  actInfo['dataset'] = ar[5]
  msg['actInfo'] = actInfo
  msg['roleId'] = actInfo.roleId
}
msg['check'] = check
return msg

name: set user data to flow
set user query
func:
let socialUid      = msg['userInfo'].providerData[0].uid
let socialProvider = msg['userInfo'].providerData[0].providerId
let cp             = msg.req.params.cp

let sqlStr = 
`SELECT usr.*, 
       r.rolename, 
       r.dataset 
FROM   ((SELECT * 
        FROM   api_user 
        WHERE  userblock = 0 
               AND cpid = (SELECT cpid 
                           FROM   api_cp 
                           WHERE  cpname = "${cp}") 
               AND userid = (SELECT userid 
                             FROM   api_user_social_mapping 
                             WHERE  socialtype = "${socialProvider}" 
                                    AND socialid = "${socialUid}")) AS usr 
        LEFT JOIN api_role AS r 
               ON usr.roleid = r.roleid)`

msg['flow'] = getRandomNumber(10)
msg['topic'] = sqlStr
return msg
function getRandomNumber(quantity_of_nums){
   var milliseconds = new Date().getMilliseconds()
   return Math.floor(milliseconds * quantity_of_nums / 1000)
}

name: set user to flow
gen token
insert login history
func:
let userInfo = msg['userInfo']
let dbUser = msg['dbUser']
let newPayload = []
userInfo['token'] = msg.payload

let sqlStr = 'insert into api_login_history(userId, userToken, history_login_time, history_ip, history_type, createTime) values ('+dbUser.userId+',"'+msg.payload+'", current_time(), "'+userInfo.ip+'", '+userInfo.type+', current_time())'
msg['flow'] = getRandomNumber(10)
msg['topic'] = sqlStr
msg['userInfo'] = userInfo
newPayload.push(msg.payload)
newPayload.push(60)
newPayload.push('')
msg.payload = newPayload
return msg
function getRandomNumber(quantity_of_nums){
   var milliseconds = new Date().getMilliseconds()
   return Math.floor(milliseconds * quantity_of_nums / 1000)
}

name: set result
func:
let newPayload = {}
let userData = {}
let userInfo = msg['userInfo']
let dbUser = msg['dbUser']
let grps = msg['grps']
if(msg.payload.affectedRows && msg.payload.affectedRows > 0){
    userData['name'] = dbUser['userName']
    userData['nickName'] = dbUser['nickName']
    userData['gender'] = dbUser['gender']
    userData['pic'] = dbUser['pic']
    userData['email'] = dbUser['email']
    newPayload['userInfo'] = userData
    newPayload['services'] = grps
    newPayload['role'] = dbUser['roleName']
    newPayload['authToken'] = userInfo['token']
    newPayload['responseCode'] = '000'
    newPayload['responseMsg'] = 'login success'
}else{
    newPayload['responseCode'] = '999'
    newPayload['responseMsg'] = 'insert history fail'
}
msg['payload'] = newPayload
return msg

  expireTime = msg.payload[0]['p_value']
}
newPayload.push(userInfo.token)
newPayload.push(expireTime)
newPayload.push(userInfo.decryptToken)
msg.payload = newPayload
return msg

name: set insert user sql
func:
let userInfo = msg['actInfo']
let role = 15
let sqlStr = `
INSERT INTO api_user 
( 
            cpid, 
            roleid, 
            username, 
            nickname, 
            gender, 
            userpwd, 
            devicetype, 
            pic, 
            email, 
            userblock, 
            usertype, 
            createtime, 
            createuser 
) 
VALUES 
( 
            ${userInfo.cpId}, 
            ${role}, 
            "${userInfo.name}", 
            "${userInfo.name}", 
            "${userInfo.gender}", 
            "${msg.payload}", 
            ${userInfo.type}, 
            "dummy", 
            "${userInfo.email}", 
            0, 
            0, 
            CURRENT_TIME(), 
            1 
)
`

node.warn(sqlStr)
msg['flow'] = getRandomNumber(10)
msg['topic'] = sqlStr
return msg
function getRandomNumber(quantity_of_nums){
   var milliseconds = new Date().getMilliseconds()
   return Math.floor(milliseconds * quantity_of_nums / 1000)
}
return msg;
